医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究调查了 2023 年以色列恐怖袭击后医疗保健专业人员的福祉2023 年 10 月 7 日，以色列南部发生的恐怖袭击迫使无数人撤离，对医护人员提出了强烈要求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-investigates-health-care-professionals-well-being-in-the-wake-of-2023-terrorist-attack-in-Israel.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-investigates-health-care-professionals-well-being-in-the-wake-of-2023-terrorist-attack-in-Israel.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01d875d9-e717-4612-b660-292c8a8461de Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:15:30 -0500 Study investigates health care professionals' well-being in the wake of 2023 terrorist attack in Israel
使用适应的名义组技术来塑造老年人的护理轨迹参与性研究方法是家庭医学和初级卫生保健研究的重要工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Using-adapted-nominal-group-technique-to-shape-care-trajectories-for-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Using-adapted-nominal-group-technique-to-shape-care-trajectories-for-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e7c8882-282b-4269-a298-377187b16ae5 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:10:41 -0500 Using adapted nominal group technique to shape care trajectories for older adults
为家庭医生在战时护理中发挥更大的作用做好准备在战争和冲突中，家庭医生经常被要求发挥更大的作用，并目睹个人、家庭、社区和民众遭受的巨大精神和身体痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Preparing-family-phycians-for-expanded-roles-in-wartime-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Preparing-family-phycians-for-expanded-roles-in-wartime-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53c79416-43c4-4823-88f1-a79aa358b524 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:06:53 -0500 Preparing family physicians for expanded roles in wartime care
大流行期间医疗保险和医疗补助受益人与健康相关的社会需求增加在 COVID-19 大流行期间，为满足 Medicare 和 Medicaid 受益人的健康相关社会需求 (HRSN)（例如住房和食物）所做的努力还不够。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Health-lated-social-needs-increased-for-Medicare-and-Medicaid-beneficiaries-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Health-lated-social-needs-increased-for-Medicare-and-Medicaid-beneficiaries-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e28a8eb-5e4e-46e8-b97d-0fcd71a767d7 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:04:47 -0500 Health-related social needs increased for Medicare and Medicaid beneficiaries during the pandemic
Atlas 绘制血浆蛋白图谱以改变疾病诊断和治疗研究人员开发了最全面的图谱，将血浆蛋白与超过 53,000 名个体的疾病和特征联系起来，为精准医疗提供了突破性的见解。该资源揭示了 168,100 个蛋白质与疾病的关联，并确定了新的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Atlas-maps-plasma- Proteins-to-transform-disease-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Atlas-maps-plasma- Proteins-to-transform-disease-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dad7b394-b06d-4152-a779-f519c8c81b0d Mon, 25 Nov 2024 22:59:00 -0500 Atlas maps plasma proteins to transform disease diagnosis and treatment
蛋白质凝胶为个人护肤品提供可持续解决方案如果您有细致的护肤习惯，您就会知道个人护肤品 (PSCP) 是一门大生意。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Protein-based-gel-offers-sustainable-solution-for-personal-skincare-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Protein-based-gel-offers-sustainable-solution-for-personal-skincare-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20bbcc5c-4fee-4c76-9967-aeb05d800281 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 22:57:44 -0500 Protein-based gel offers sustainable solution for personal skincare products
助推器可显着降低长期新冠病毒风险疫苗接种，尤其是加强剂量，可将长期感染新冠病毒的风险降低高达 29%，凸显了其在预防 Omicron 时代挥之不去的并发症方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Boosters-cut-long-COVID-risk-significantly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Boosters-cut-long-COVID-risk-significantly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4076793-61b1-4d4e-88ca-b9994e493f01 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 22:20:00 -0500 Boosters cut long COVID risk significantly
GLP-1 受体激动剂被证明对肾脏和心血管结局有效对胰高血糖素样肽 1 (GLP-1) 受体激动剂对肾脏和心血管结局的最大、最全面的分析表明，它们对糖尿病患者和非糖尿病患者都有显着的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/GLP-1-receptor-agonists-prove- effective-for-kidney-and-cardioangio-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/GLP-1-receptor-agonists-prove- effective-for-kidney-and-cardioangio-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e09df3c-d421-40a3-a58f-a19d654ffc2e Mon, 25 Nov 2024 22:12:00 -0500 GLP-1 receptor agonists prove effective for kidney and cardiovascular outcomes
新资金扩大了双相情感障碍大脑变化的研究Leila Nabulsi 博士是南加州大学凯克医学院马克和玛丽史蒂文斯神经影像和信息学研究所 (Stevens INI) 的计算神经科学博士后研究员，已获得资助以扩大双相情感障碍神经回路的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/New-Funding-Expands-Study-of-Brain-Changes-in-Bipolar-Disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/New-Funding-Expands-Study-of-Brain-Changes-in-Bipolar-Disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3eee3f1e-2f19-466e-8f92-32837dbbe38a Mon, 25 Nov 2024 22:10:00 -0500 New funding expands study of brain changes in bipolar disorder
革命性策略为 1 型糖尿病治疗带来希望再生医学具有非凡的前景，未来需要新细胞、组织或器官的患者将不再需要依赖捐赠者。器官短缺和细胞类型不匹配将成为过去的问题，取而代之的是为任何需要移植的人提供安全、按需选择的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Revolutionary-strategy-offers-hope-for-type-1-diabetes-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Revolutionary-strategy-offers-hope-for-type-1-diabetes-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d870bf90-1cc7-4f22-b149-46e0cca7dc3c Mon, 25 Nov 2024 22:07:00 -0500 Revolutionary strategy offers hope for type 1 diabetes treatment
